alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 5:06PM EDT until August 10 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR YORK COUNTY AND THE CITY OF HAMPTON, THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS AND THE CITY OF POQUOSON... At 506 PM EDT, the public reported street flooding in Newport News, especially near Patrick Henry Mall. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Newport News, Hampton, Patrick Henry Field, Seaford, Christopher Newport University, Langley AFB, Tabb, Denbigh, Beaconsdale, Lee Hall, Fort Eustis, Dare, Oyster Point, Oriana, Hornsbyville, Harris Grove, Menchville, Newport News Golf Course, Messick and Plum Tree Island Refuge. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; York
